item.title: LunaPure thermal system simulation
item.description:
DISCLAIMER

This project is ongoing and is currently under the intellectually property of the Pacific Space Exploration Corp and Canadian Space Mining Corperation so the information on this site is a work in progress and has been allowed to be disclosed with supervision.

Overview

I created a Simulink model of PARSEC’s lunar water purification system to help fellow engineers to improve their thermal system and understand the mechanism of the reactor.
